WARNING: please sort this by date, newest first
this is because the date might not be machine readable, e.g. 1-5 Dec 2021
it is not impossible to use a start and end date to represent a time period
and then format dates in the ISO 8601
but then we would have to decide on how to format the time period
and also how to sort if the [start, end] time period overlap with other date
also yes, json does not support comments
